title: Say Yes!
author: verias
text:
So, sorry for the filler delays, holidays kept things pretty hectic around here.

Anyway, this idea has been in my head for a bit, but I wasn't 100% on what kind of dress I wanted Theresa in.

Recently, the other half and I have been watching a lot of "Say Yes to the Dress" and it finally occurred to me, why not have Theresa wearing a designer gown?

In this case, the gown itself is actually a design by Kleinfeld designer Pnina Tornai.

See you guys again soon!
